confirmation-message:
Jou transaksie is ingedien!
Dit sal in jou geskiedenis verskyn nadat "n paar blokke gemyn is.

receive.tooltip-emoji-id-text: Dit is jou Emoji ID. Dit kan gebruik word as "n alternatief vir jou gewone txn-adres om XTM te stuur en te ontvang.

keychain.warning:
Keychain access is required for this operation.
Please try again and select “allow”.

pin.creation-subtitle:
Set a secure PIN code to protect your wallet on this device.
Your PIN stays private—it’s never stored or shared with Tari Universe.
pin.creation-subtitle-confirm: Enter your PIN again to confirm it is correct.
pin.error-match: That’s not quite right. Try again or create a new PIN.
pin.explainer: If you forget this PIN, the only way to regain access to your wallet is by restoring it from your seed phrase.

reminder.description: You haven't secured your wallet yet. Backing up your seed phrase keeps your tokens safe and ensures only you can access them.\nLet's do it now—it'll only take a moment
reminder.title: Protect your Tari

security.seedwords-empty: Add seed words to restore another Tari Address

send.completed-text: Jou oordragindiening is nou voltooi en sal uitgesaai word.
send.processing-text: Jou oordrag word verwerk. Dit kan "n paar minute neem.

swap.buy-tari-subtitle: Buy Tari from any of these supported exchanges.
swap.no-other-tokens-available: Geen ander tokens beskikbaar om te kies nie.
swap.please-confirm-approval-in-wallet: Bevestig asseblief goedkeuring in jou beursie
swap.scan-qr-code: Skandeer die QR-kode om jou beursie op jou foon te koppel
swap.sign-message: Teken die boodskap op jou mobiele toestel
swap.sign-message-text: Keur hierdie transaksie goed met Metamask op jou mobiele toestel. Sodra dit onderteken is, sal jou transaksie verwerk word.
swap.transaction-could-not-be-completed: Die transaksie kon nie voltooi word nie
swap.you-will-receive: Jy sal {{symbol}} ontvang in (Tari beursie adres)
swap.your-purchase-is-processing: Jou aankoop word verwerk. Dit kan 'n paar minute neem.

sync-message.line3: until your wallet balance is displayed
sync-message.tooltip-description: This was your last synced balance, we'll update it once the wallet is ready.
sync-message.tooltip-description-mining: This was your last synced balance, we'll update it once the wallet is ready. But don’t worry, you’re actively mining and earning XTM.
sync-message.top-line: You are now mining Tari XTM
